interpretation:
The rainbow card is a symbol of hope and promise. It represents the idea that after a storm, there is always a chance for something beautiful to emerge. The rainbow can also signify the bridging of opposites, bringing together different elements and creating a harmonious whole. It is a reminder to stay positive and look for the good in any situation. 

In a reading, the rainbow card can suggest that the querent should keep their spirits up and look for the silver lining in a difficult situation. It can also indicate that a reconciliation or bringing together of opposing forces is possible. Overall, the rainbow card represents a sense of optimism and a belief in the power of positive thinking.
